import React from 'react' import {Col, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import Image from "react-bootstrap/Image" import star from "../assets/star.png" import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import {DEVICE_ROUTE} from '../utils/consts' const DeviceItem = ({device}) => { const navigate = useNavigate() return ( navigate(DEVICE_ROUTE + "/" + device.id)}> {/*
Samsung...
{device.rating}
*/}
{device.name}

{device.name}
цена: {device.price} руб.
 ) } export default DeviceItem
